parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Loads person's identity from [[Objects.sav]] file in campaign directory (from entry name).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person '''loadIdentity''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> This command doesn't work in Multiplayer
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ok <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[player]] '''loadIdentity''' "playerIdentity"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[saveIdentity]], [[lockIdentity]], [[setIdentity]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|LOADIDENTITY]]
